mapper.insert: insert into order (id, user_id, name, price, number, order_time, status, type) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{number}, #{orderTime}, #{status}, #{type})
mapper.update: update order set id=#{id}, user_id=#{userId}, name=#{name}, price=#{price}, number=#{number}, order_time=#{orderTime}, status=#{status}, type=#{type} where id = #{id}
